body_html: Tensorflow default var_list contains 'variables.trainable_variables()', 'ops.get_collection(ops.GraphKeys.TRAINABLE_RESOURCE_VARIABLES)', and 'ops.get_collection(ops.GraphKeys._STREAMING_MODEL_PORTS)', but in your code, there is no trainable variables. Because 'tf.assign(phi,x)' assigns Tensor x to phi, and phi become an Tensor rather than a Variable.
